CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Similarly , the measured field - effect mobility of PFD2TBT , PFD2TBT-5Per , and PFD2TBT-10Per was 2.7 × 10^-6 , 1.1 × 10^-5 , and 2.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / ( V s ) , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. PFD2TBT: This is a material name.
2. PFD2TBT-5Per: This is also a material name, with "5Per" being a modifier indicating a 5% concentration or modification of the base material PFD2TBT.
3. PFD2TBT-10Per: This is another material name, with "10Per" being a modifier indicating a 10% concentration or modification of the base material PFD2TBT.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

So, the property names in the paragraph are: "measured field-effect mobility", "PFD2TBT", "PFD2TBT-5Per", and "PFD2TBT-10Per". The units "cm^2" and "( V s )" are not property names, but rather units used to describe the property "measured field-effect mobility".

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Similarly , the measured field - effect mobility of PFD2TBT , PFD2TBT-5Per , and PFD2TBT-10Per was 2.7 × 10^-6 , 1.1 × 10^-5 , and 2.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / ( V s ) , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. Measured field-effect mobility of PFD2TBT: 2.7 × 10^-6 cm^2 / (V s), 1.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / (V s), and 2.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / (V s)

Properties:
- Mobility: a measure of how easily charge carriers move through a material in response to an electric field.
- Measured field-effect mobility: the mobility value that has been measured experimentally.
- PFD2TBT, PFD2TBT-5Per, PFD2TBT-10Per: different types of materials.

Values:
- 2.7 × 10^-6 cm^2 / (V s)
- 1.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / (V s)
- 2.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / (V s)

So, the property value entities in the paragraph are the measured field-effect mobilities (2.7 × 10^-6 cm^2 / (V s), 1.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / (V s), and 2.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / (V s)) of PFD2TBT, PFD2TBT-5Per, and PFD2TBT-10Per, respectively.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Property values:
- 2.7 × 10^-6 cm^2 / (V s)
- 1.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / (V s)
- 2.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / (V s)

These values represent the measured field-effect mobilities of different materials (PFD2TBT, PFD2TBT-5Per, and PFD2TBT-10Per), but since the focus is on the property values, we can remove the references to the materials and keep only the values themselves.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 2.7 × 10^-6 cm^2 / (V s) |
| 1.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / (V s) |
| 2.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / (V s) |

This table presents the measured field-effect mobilities as property values, precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
